articles.content: Paris: Wind farms act as a top "predator" in some ecosystems, harming birds at the top of the food chain and triggering a knock-on effect overlooked by green energy advocates, scientists said Monday.… [+3215 chars]

articles.title: Lunar eclipse to be visible in India on night of August 7 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The penumbral part of the lunar eclipse, which is difficult to discern, will start at 9:20 pm on Monday night, while the partial phase will start at 10:52 pm.
articles.content:
A lunar eclipse will occur on the night of August 7 (Monday), continuing until early the next morning, and will be visible in India and all over Asia, Europe, and Africa.

articles.description: The Sunday’s supermoon is one in a three-part series, according to NASA. Another supermoon sighting is expected on January 1 and January 31, 2018.
